reviewText: I really like this instructor. So easy to understand and follow.
Awesome for extreme beginners and people with two left feet like me.

Cal Pozo put together a good series of dance routines.
We use it a lot to keep up with the dance steps we have
not use in a while.
It's wonderful to be able to stop and review the smallest bits on the videos.  We're also doing group and individual lessons.  This is great support to all of it.
i didn't like this dvd. and i ordered a couple of his dvds and didn't like either one because they are all like for old people. its not even appealing to watch.
Great dvd for to learn the to dance Salsa and Samba  easy to learn just follow what they tell you and watch how they dance in now time you well be good dancer

i have been a fan of cal pozo eversince i bought his first video dance lessons from way past when he still had hair.  i learned a lot from his video dance instruction series and he is one of a few teachers who gives good dance instructions that is easy to follow.  he makes them simple and fun to learn.  this new dvd dance lessons of cal pozo is recommnended for the beginning students of salsa and samba.  i wish that cal pozo could have given equal time to samba lessons as he did in this salsa lessons. he gave more emphasis on salsa in this dvd.  but although the samba lessons are much shorter than the salsa lessons, cal was able to give the secret techniques to some of the samba steps.  i am awaiting the second of a series of these dvd lessons or the more advance lessons if cal would do so in the future.
